nodes.text: The Theed Hangar was a spacious hangar attached to one side of the Royal Palace in Theed, Naboo. It was separated from the city's plasma power plant by a heavy blast-proof door, and housed the headquarters of both the Royal Naboo Security Forces and the Naboo Royal Space Fighter Corps, two organizations that served the Royal House of Naboo. The roof of the hangar was blast-proof. Above the main hangar was a space that contained systems that could "burn out" enemy radar systems. This space was also used by air traffic controllers.
The hangar could hold the Royal Starship and at least twenty-seven N-1 starfighters.
